text: release version {dbplyr} 2.4.0 greater now required removes TDM related stuff, including functions calculate_tdm() tdm_conditions_met(), Transition Disruption Metric vignette

title: pacta.portfolio.allocate 0.0.2
text: loses tdm_scenarios() determine_tdm_variables() favour defining parameters explicitly workflow.transition.monitor (#3). tdm_conditions_met gains arguments data, t0, delta_t1, delta_t2, scenarios additional groups. function now expanded comprehensive validation (#17). adds new functions get_entity_info() left_join_entity_info() facilitate reading merging entity info -disk SQLite database available modifies merge_abcd_from_db() function can read merge ABCD_scenario data -disk SQLite database available adds new merge_abcd_from_db() drop-replacement pattern ald_scen_eq <- get_ald_scen("Equity"); port_eq_old <- merge_in_ald(port_eq, ald_scen_eq); rm(ald_scen_eq). depends {dplyr} >= 1.1.0 new per-operation grouping ./(see ?dplyr_by), new dplyr::join_by() function. lose exported function data_includes_tdm_scenarios(). determine_tdm_variables now sets delta_t2 = 10 (used 9). quit_if_no_pacta_relevant_data() now also generates PDF error message place executive summary (#212). quit_if_no_pacta_relevant_data() now fails Bonds ALD fin_sector (#194).
